name: Void (itch) (Mae, Akty Elements)
description:
You are a black hole, consuming everything you come into contact with.

How to play:

  • Use mouse to move
  • Consume smaller objects to grow
  • Avoid larger objects or you will shrink

Credits:

  • Programming and art by Mae
  • Music and SFX by Akty Elements (https://akty-elements.itch.io/)
  • Font: Retron 2000 by Daymarius (https://www.dafont.com/retron2000.font)
